event_data.task: PRE-CHECK: Check if MariaDB is already running and synced

res.cmd:
if ! systemctl is-active --quiet mariadb; then
  echo "OFFLINE"
else
  # Try Unix Socket first (works for fresh installs/root sudo)
  STATUS=$(mariadb -u root -N -s -e "SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_local_state_comment';" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')
  
  # If STATUS is empty, it means Socket failed (likely due to password hardening)
  if [ -z "$STATUS" ]; then
    PASS="StrongPass123!"
    STATUS=$(mariadb -u root -p"$PASS" -N -s -e "SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_local_state_comment';" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')
  fi
  
  echo "${STATUS:-LOCKED}"
fi

module_args._raw_params:
if ! systemctl is-active --quiet mariadb; then
  echo "OFFLINE"
else
  # Try Unix Socket first (works for fresh installs/root sudo)
  STATUS=$(mariadb -u root -N -s -e "SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_local_state_comment';" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')
  
  # If STATUS is empty, it means Socket failed (likely due to password hardening)
  if [ -z "$STATUS" ]; then
    PASS="StrongPass123!"
    STATUS=$(mariadb -u root -p"$PASS" -N -s -e "SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_local_state_comment';" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')
  fi
  
  echo "${STATUS:-LOCKED}"
fi
